data.description:
*new* Apply to become a Zoe content publisher and start building Mixed Reality experiences today!

Zoe enables the rapid creation of interactive 3D scenes through a no-code interface and automation. Invite your friends, students, colleagues and clients to collaborate, learn and create together in real-time. 

What can I create with Zoe?

With Zoe you can create anything you have in mind. It has been used to host activities, create learning games, build interactive stories, adventure games, and even mini-games for therapy.

Our free version includes templates, creator tools and multiplayer capabilities for up to 3 members. Visit zoeimmersive.com to learn how you can increase the number of collaborators.

Ready to use Templates
Environments
350+ Local Assets
1M+ Free Online Assets Through Sketchfab
3 Projects and 3 Scenes Per Project
Unlimited Interactions

changelog.change_log: Faster loading. New Repeat function for interactions. Onboarding lessons various improvements. Environments, assets, UI, camera position and multiplayer fixes. Fix audio causing app to crash.
New assets in the Library and two new environments for building Sci-fi and Math experiences!
New authentication system and backend performance improvements. Minor assets fixes.
Loft and Lab new environments, and more assets.
Updated links to new domain zoeimmersive.com - terms&cond -
Updated links to new domain zoeimmersive.com
Bug fix. Fixed issue when inviting members and system returning their status as already invited

New duplicate function for assets. Possibility of deleting conditions and actions individually inside an interaction. New video tutorials available in the Help section. Handling when the backend goes in maintenance.

Onboarding tutorial improvements. 
 UI fixes and improvements locking objects now prevents them from being deleted as well. 
 Analytics. 
 Multiplayer minor fixes.
General improvements and bugfixes. Link to web dashboard subscriptions. New environment and assets
Environments visual adjustments. Multiplayer UI adjustment
